Text:
please give me a link for the english subtitle...none of the subtitle seem to work with this movie file...either the text is too slow or too fast...
v-8.5
a-9
m-10
please a proper subtitle file which goes with the arira file......

Hey, if your using the VLC Media player under tools there are command boxes that allow for you yo synchronize the subtitles with any movie. I had a similair problem with a different movie with Sub off track and too fast and VLC allows for you to fix most any sync problems with aido video and subtitles. Hope that helps.

Hey, if U have VLC MP, and not,get it.
VLC has Kool Tools to fix most any A/V & ST sync anomalies.

Open VLC App-under Tools select Track Synchronization. Their is a set of adjustment tools that allows you to sync up your AV ST needs and enjoy the flick.

Hope this helps,
Cheers
R2
